page.title: 10A Day in the Life of? 3
page.content: 12.30p.m.Time for second sitting to go in to dinner. I collected my packed lunch.I had cheese and cucumber sandwiches,then a piece of jam cake and a Breakaway biscuit.I also had a nice cool drink of orange juice from my flask. 1.00p.m. I went back inside and wrote in my Domesday Project Book. 1.30p.m. We went outside for games.We played Danish Rounders.Our class got 31 rounders and their class got 16 rounders.We made friends with Kate again.We came in at 2.55. 3.00p.m.We went for upper school assembly and stayed there until 3.30 when the hometime bell went. 3.30p.m. Went home and changed into my shorts and sun top.I had a cider apple ice pop then gave Skippy my rabbit a drink.
